verses.verse: A Psalm of David. Bless <S%H1288><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, O my soul <S%H5315><s%>; And all that is within <S%H7130><s%> me <S%H6944><s%>, bless his holy name <S%H8034><s%>.
Bless <S%H1288><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, O my soul <S%H5315><s%>, And forget <S%H7911><s%> not all his benefits <S%H1576><s%>:
Who forgiveth <S%H5545><s%> all thine iniquities <S%H5771><s%>; Who healeth <S%H7495><s%> all thy diseases <S%H8463><s%>;
Who redeemeth <S%H1350><s%> thy life <S%H2416><s%> from destruction <S%H7845><s%>; Who crowneth <S%H5849><s%> thee with lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and tender mercies <S%H7356><s%>;
Who satisfieth <S%H7646><s%> thy desire <S%H5716><s%> with good <S%H2896><s%> things <S%H5271><s%>, So that thy youth is renewed like the eagle <S%H2318><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> executeth <S%H6213><s%> righteous <S%H6666><s%> acts <S%H4941><s%>, And judgments for all that are oppressed <S%H6231><s%>.
He made known <S%H3045><s%> his ways <S%H1870><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, His doings <S%H5949><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is merciful <S%H7349><s%> and gracious <S%H2587><s%>, Slow <S%H750><s%> to anger <S%H639><s%>, and abundant <S%H7227><s%> in lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%>.
He will not always <S%H5331><s%> chide <S%H7378><s%>; Neither will he keep <S%H5201><s%> his anger for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
He hath not dealt <S%H6213><s%> with us after our sins <S%H2399><s%>, Nor rewarded <S%H1580><s%> us after our iniquities <S%H5771><s%>.
For as the heavens <S%H8064><s%> are high above <S%H1361><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>, So great <S%H1396><s%> is his lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> toward them that fear him <S%H3373><s%>.
As far as <S%H7368><s%> the east <S%H4217><s%> is from the west <S%H4628><s%>, So far hath he removed <S%H7368><s%> our transgressions from us <S%H6588><s%>.
Like as a father <S%H1><s%> pitieth <S%H7355><s%> his children <S%H1121><s%>, So Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> pitieth <S%H7355><s%> them that fear him <S%H3373><s%>.
For he knoweth <S%H3045><s%> our frame <S%H3336><s%>; He remembereth <S%H2142><s%> that we are dust <S%H6083><s%>.
As for man <S%H582><s%>, his days <S%H3117><s%> are as grass <S%H2682><s%>; As a flower <S%H6731><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>, so he flourisheth <S%H6692><s%>.
For the wind <S%H7307><s%> passeth over <S%H5674><s%> it <S%H4725><s%>, and it is gone; And the place thereof shall know it no more <S%H5234><s%>.

But the lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is from everlasting <S%H5769><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> everlasting <S%H5769><s%> upon them that fear <S%H3373><s%> him <S%H6666><s%>, And his righteousness unto children <S%H1121><s%>'s children <S%H1121><s%>;
To such as keep <S%H8104><s%> his covenant <S%H1285><s%>, And to those that remember <S%H2142><s%> his precepts <S%H6490><s%> to do them <S%H6213><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath established <S%H3559><s%> his throne <S%H3678><s%> in the heavens <S%H8064><s%>; And his kingdom <S%H4438><s%> ruleth over all <S%H4910><s%>.

Bless <S%H1288><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, ye his angels <S%H4397><s%>, That are mighty <S%H1368><s%> in strength <S%H3581><s%>, that fulfil <S%H6213><s%> his word <S%H1697><s%>, Hearkening <S%H8085><s%> unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of his word <S%H1697><s%>.
Bless <S%H1288><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, all ye his hosts <S%H6635><s%>, Ye ministers <S%H8334><s%> of his <S%H6213><s%>, that do his pleasure <S%H7522><s%>.

Bless <S%H1288><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, all ye his works <S%H4639><s%>, In all places <S%H4725><s%> of his dominion <S%H4475><s%>: Bless <S%H1288><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, O my soul <S%H5315><s%>.
